text: Ezɨ Jehoiadan otarim Benaia, a Kapselɨn nguibamɨn gumazim, a uaghan mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavir mam. Egha mɨdorozir avɨrir mabagh amua apaniba abɨni. Dughiar mamɨn, Benaia Moapɨn kantrin gumazim, Ariel, an otarir pumuning mɨsoghezɨ aning areme. Ezɨ gɨn dughiar orangtɨzimɨn, aisɨn ofɨziba irima, a mozir mam giraghugha laionɨn mam mɨsoghezɨma an areme.
